comments.body:
Any `make tests` or `make check` we can run on these two install commands.

Also, I would consifer splitting the mpi and serial packages.

Added test run.
I don't think that splitting in two different packages the mpi and the thread only version is something that I want to do at the moment.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@cd build_mpi
cmake ../ -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=mpicxx -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=mpicc -DUSE_MPI=ON -DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE="$PYTHON" $ARGS
make
make test
cp -v analisi "$PREFIX/bin/analisi"
